meanings.definition: A type of protein found in connective tissue.
meanings.sent1: Tropocollagens provide strength to our skin and bones.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study tropocollagens to understand how our body holds together.
meanings.sent3: The tropocollagens in our body are like tiny building blocks holding us up.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the tropocollagens in our tendons.
meanings.sent5: The scientist marveled at the intricate web of tropocollagens under the microscope.

meanings.definition: The basic structural unit of collagen fibers.
meanings.sent1: Each strand of collagen is made up of tropocollagens.
meanings.sent2: The tropocollagens align perfectly to form strong collagen fibers.
meanings.sent3: The tropocollagens in the collagen party danced in unison.
meanings.sent4: His words wove a story as intricate as the tropocollagens in connective tissue.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a picture of tropocollagens intertwining like a beautiful tapestry.
